<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>WEBINARInstalling and Flying AeroNav 800/900/910 Navigators from BendixKing
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>
State of the art avionics should make life easier on the ground and in the air. From installation to single-pilot IFR navigation, AeroNav <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigators]]> frees you to focus on what you love: Flying. Join Steven Pearce, BendixKing Product Manager and Jeff Simon, SocialFlight President, A&P/IA for a discussion on how the AeroNav products fit into your next panel upgrade, as well as the features and techniques to streamline your flying.
Webinar: Installing and Flying AeroNav 800/900/910 Navigators from BendixKing Date: Tuesday, June 18th Time: 8 p.m. EDT
Topics Include:
- Installation Considerations and Tips - BendixKing Strategies for The Future Panel & Partnerships - Hybrid Touch & Buttons - Intuitive Navigation - Backup Attitude with Synthetic Vision - Comparisons and Demo
Steven Pearce is an avid pilot and has flown in nearly every weather condition possible. He’s also an active contributor on several pilot boards; his knowledge base of avionics and airframes extended through these groups provides the engaging baseline for this webinar. This webinar is produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>. SocialFlight is a popular mobile app and website that provides pilots with an interactive map of over 20,000 searchable aviation events and seminars. Jeff Simon, President of SocialFlight, is an A&P/IA mechanic, avionics industry expert, pilot and aircraft owner.
